features: [ANTI TIP FURNITURE STRAPS FOR CHILD SAFETY] 4our Kiddies furniture straps secure furniture to the wall to help against furniture tipping over, even during earthquakes and windstorms. If you have children or pets at home, consider using this anti-tip kit to anchor all of your top-heavy and unsteady furniture, babyproof your home to prevent accidental furniture tip-overs. Create and maintain a safe environment for your kids and pets.

[HIGH-QUALITY HEAVY DUTY FURNITURE WALL STRAPS] The Impact-resistant furniture anchors are comprised of two brackets tethered by a strap. The application of new material (Nylon 6t) provides the furniture anchors kit a higher stiffness and strength. The straps also have good flame-retardant property, high stability, and cracking property, which effectively enhances the safety and stability for keeping your furniture in place.

[QUICK RELEASE DETACHABLE MAKE MOVING FURNITURE EASILY] The safety strap provides a positive and reliable lock when engaged and slips off easily with a press of the release so that you can easily and safely clean behind your furniture when needed. As the furniture straps are installed in the back, you cannot see the straps from the front but they may be visible from the sides.

[6 PACK BABY FURNITURE ANCHORS SATISFIED MORE YOUR NEEDS] The package includes 6 pack furniture safety straps. The adjustable straps also come with illustrated instructions and all needed hardware for installation. Perfect for anchoring TV stand, drawer, cabinets, bookcases, dresser, armoires, wardrobes, and any furniture. NOTE: for best protection and results, 2 straps are required per TV or piece of furniture.

[EARTHQUAKE RESISTANT FURNITURE STRAPS] Earthquakes strike without warning. Our heavy-duty straps can safely secure your furniture items especially the bookcases or tall furniture that could slide or fall when earthquake occurs below 5.5 quake. We would advise 2 straps are used per furniture item for the best result.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Baby Proofing Furniture Straps (6 Pack) Anti Tip Furniture Kits for Child Safety from 4our Kiddies We all have furniture around the house that can pose falling hazards for our children. All stand-alone ranges should also be secured with an anti-tip device, as kids tend to climb up on open oven doors and use it as a step — and always when your back is turned! Unbelievable Furniture-tipping Facts in USA Someone is injured by a piece of furniture tipping over each 15 minutes.Of all tip-over fatalities, 91% of them happen in the home.Every other week on average, a kid dies from tipped-over furniture.Toddlers are involved in over 66% of fatalities from furniture tip-over Reliable and Easy Solutions: 4our Kiddies Furniture anti-tip strap makes sense to secure heavy furniture in earthquake zones to prevent tipping, but it’s also a part of childproofing your home. Features: Comes with 6 adjustable safety strap sets, meet your multiple needs in the home. Note: 2 straps are required per piece of furniture.6 sets includes all hardware including screws, adjustable straps, brackets, wall anchors.The furniture straps are made from high-quality Nylon, no cheap plastics, no velcro and no glue.The safety straps are detachable and adjustable so that parents can easily and safely clean behind their child's furniture when needed.Installation is easy and quick. The anti-tip furniture kits come with a user-friendly instruction and all necessary hardware pieces.Effective for tipping prevention.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 14, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Seems to be working well
reviews.reviewText: I bought these to anchor my 5 year olds childrens loft bed to the wall as it was a little wobbly. I found the studs attached the plastic pieces and zip tied the bed and pieces together. The bed is definitely more sturdy now. My five year old climbs in bed with confidence.

reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Safety in our home and piece of mind.
reviews.reviewText: It’s a perfect way to secure our dresser to the wall so the little ones are safe should they open all the draws at the same time.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 13, 2024
reviews.reviewText: It’s easy to install and now my furniture feels secure for my little one to explore around the house as she grows.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
Reviewed in the United States on January 7, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Just set this up behind one of our leaning floor mirrors. It was very straightforward and quick to do.

reviews.reviewTitle: Easy to install and good quality
reviews.reviewText: This furniture straps are easy to install and puts my mind at ease when my toddler decides to pull on the dresser drawers before I can stop her. Also well made

reviews.reviewText: These are great and you can’t beat the price. They work really well to secure furniture. I generally use two on either side of the furniture to just be safe
